  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/MelJStride">

    </a>
  </h2>

  

      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr">MP for Central Devon, Financial Secretary to the Treasury and HM Paymaster General</p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Mel Stride MP Retweeted HM Treasury</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Glad to see <a href="/hmtreasury" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="18904582"><s>@</s><b>hmtreasury</b></a> Finance Act 2018 has now received Royal Assent.   </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="971400159367192577" id="stream-item-tweet-971400159367192577" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;971400159367192577&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">A heads-up on some of the MPs who will be asking a <a href="/hashtag/PMQs?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>PMQs</b></a> on Wednesday.

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="969189419310862337" id="stream-item-tweet-969189419310862337" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;969189419310862337&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The Government very clearly set out the detail of our position on future customs arrangements over 6 months ago. This explicitly included our objective to avoid a hard border in Northern Ireland. <a href="https://t.co/GQWVuHG4OR" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/637748/Future_customs_arrangements_-_a_future_partnership_paper.pdf" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/637748/Future_customs_arrangements_-_a_future_partnership_paper.pdf"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">gov.uk/government/upl</span><span class="invisible">oads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/637748/Future_customs_arrangements_-_a_future_partnership_paper.pdf</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/X0UC8AjAGc" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/X0UC8AjAGc</a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Mel Stride MP Retweeted HM Treasury</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Spring hasnt quite arrived but the Spring Statement is just around the corner. Expect no tax/spend changes until the autumn... heres <a href="/hmtreasury" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="18904582"><s>@</s><b>hmtreasury</b></a> video to explain: <a href="/hashtag/OneFiscalEvent?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>OneFiscalEvent</b></a><a href="https://t.co/QJenXQeo5u" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/hmtreasury/status/968804671048634369" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/hmtreasury/status/968804671048634369"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/hmtreasury/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/968804671048634369</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Mel Stride MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/hmtreasury/status/968804671048634369" data-conversation-id="968804671048634369" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="968804671048634369" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="hmtreasury" data-user-id="18904582" href="/hmtreasury/status/968804671048634369" data-conversation-id="968804671048634369" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
              <div class="QuoteMedia-videoPreview">

        <div class="AdaptiveMedia-badgeText">1:00</div>

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">HM Treasury</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>hmtreasury</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Its about as wintry as it gets right now, but Spring is on the way  and so is the Spring Statement 2018.

Heres what it is. And what it isnt. <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/BKqg0HLkAU</span></div>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/MelJStride" data-user-id="3183943337">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Earlier this week I was interviewed by <a href="/bbckamal" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="79292795"><s>@</s><b>bbckamal</b></a> on the taxation of digital businesses. We will push for international reforms but also take action in the interim if needed as we did in the Budget. <a href="/hashtag/EconomyFitForTheFuture?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>EconomyFitForTheFuture</b></a> <a href="https://t.co/JgRMO1BlHp" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/business-43161736" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/business-43161736"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">bbc.co.uk/news/business-</span><span class="invisible">43161736</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/OiB16hD5Ny" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/OiB16hD5Ny</a></p>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/AccountancyAge" data-user-id="61466939">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Best run of productivity growth since before the financial crisis. 

Employment at a near-record high  and unemployment at a near-record low.

Plus yearly borrowing reduced by over 100bn since 2010.

Good economic news as we build an economy fit for the future.<a href="https://t.co/3lPtPHJk0J" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/3lPtPHJk0J</a></p>
</div>

  </div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Mel Stride MP Retweeted Conservatives</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I will be taking through the Commons today vital measures to help first time buyers and to clamp down on tax avoidance. Will be interesting to see if Labour vote for or against these. <a href="/hashtag/economyfitforthefuture?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>economyfitforthefuture</b></a><a href="https://t.co/RqS1YjBzg9" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/conservatives/status/966037353700757504" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/conservatives/status/966037353700757504"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/conservatives/</span><span class="invisible">status/966037353700757504</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Mel Stride MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/Conservatives/status/966037353700757504" data-conversation-id="966037353700757504" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="966037353700757504" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="Conservatives" data-user-id="14281853" href="/Conservatives/status/966037353700757504" data-conversation-id="966037353700757504" tabindex="0">

  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Will you back our plan that reduces taxes for millions of hardworking people, scraps stamp duty for over 80% of 1st-time buyers and clamps down on tax avoiders so everyone pays their fair share?</div>

        <div class="media-tags-container">
    <div class="media-tagging-block">
    <a class="js-user-profile-link" href="/hmtreasury" data-user-id="18904582" rel="noopener">HM Treasury</a>,
  <a class="js-user-profile-link" href="/The_IoD" data-user-id="59417574" rel="noopener">IoD</a> and
  <a class="js-user-profile-link" href="/IoD_Press" data-user-id="78034330" rel="noopener">IoD Press Office</a>
  </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Central Devon MP <a href="/MelJStride" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3183943337"><s>@</s><b>MelJStride</b></a> has introduced secondary legislation to slash future business rate rises. As Financial Secretary to Treasury, he delivered on promise to change from Retail Price Index (RPI) to Consumer Price Index (CPI) for uprating of multiplier for business rates.<a href="https://t.co/kza7I01T0t" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/kza7I01T0t</a></p>

            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Great to address Business Club for <a href="/AlanMakMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2157036506"><s>@</s><b>AlanMakMP</b></a> yesterday. But theres more to do - thats why the Finance Bill that I am taking through the Commons brings in important tax changes, including a higher rate of Rand D relief to drive more jobs and investment.<a href="https://t.co/2RXKzUJCE7" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/2RXKzUJCE7</a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">New research from the <a href="/CPSThinkTank" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="40878868"><s>@</s><b>CPSThinkTank</b></a> has revealed that Labours plans to renationalise most utilities would cost 176 billion - nearly 6,500 for every household - and wont reduce bills for consumers. <a href="/hashtag/Marr?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Marr</b></a><a href="https://t.co/LdBtEx3yvq" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/LdBtEx3yvq</a></p>
</div>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>

        <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedVideo" data-nav="embed_video">
          <button type="button" class="dropdown-link"> Embed Video</button>
        </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Congratulations <a href="/MelJStride" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3183943337"><s>@</s><b>MelJStride</b></a> on continuing as Financial Secretary. Guernsey looks forward to continuing dialogue on matters of interest to either jurisdiction.<a href="https://t.co/vrnXqCJewH" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/meljstride/status/951055730890731520" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/meljstride/status/951055730890731520"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/meljstride/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/951055730890731520</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Gavin St Pier added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/MelJStride/status/951055730890731520" data-conversation-id="951055730890731520" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="951055730890731520" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="MelJStride" data-user-id="3183943337" href="/MelJStride/status/951055730890731520" data-conversation-id="951055730890731520" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">

  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Great to be reappointed to <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="18904582"><s>@</s><b>hmtreasury</b></span> to continue work on preparing our customs regime for EU exit and delivering a fair tax system.</div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">In the House yesterday I confirmed that I recognise this important issue raised by <a href="/NickyMorgan01" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="34940114"><s>@</s><b>NickyMorgan01</b></a> and that I am looking closely at solutions<a href="https://t.co/yd6lzUVy2n" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/commonstreasury/status/950681323525550080" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/commonstreasury/status/950681323525550080"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/commonstreasur</span><span class="invisible">y/status/950681323525550080</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Mel Stride MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Under the Taxation (Cross-Border Trade) Bill, firms would have to pay VAT upfront on goods imported from the EU before they can be released into free circulation in the UK. Chair <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="34940114"><s>@</s><b>NickyMorgan01</b></span> has written to HMRC to seek</div>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Second Reading of the Taxation (Cross-border Trade) Bill is this afternoon.           <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Mel Stride MP Retweeted AccountingWEB.co.uk</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Yesterday I was interviewed by <a href="/AccountingWEBuk" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="20788167"><s>@</s><b>AccountingWEBuk</b></a> about MTD, VAT and HMRC. You can read it here: <a href="https://t.co/pRCqSqDos9" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://buff.ly/2z6bUBe" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://buff.ly/2z6bUBe"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">buff.ly/2z6bUBe</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/jK3OjUX95X" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/accountingwebuk/status/940914375891800064" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/accountingwebuk/status/940914375891800064"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/accountingwebu</span><span class="invisible">k/status/940914375891800064</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Mel Stride MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/AccountingWEBuk/status/940914375891800064" data-conversation-id="940914375891800064" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="940914375891800064" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="AccountingWEBuk" data-user-id="20788167" href="/AccountingWEBuk/status/940914375891800064" data-conversation-id="940914375891800064" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">AccountingWEB.co.uk</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>AccountingWEBuk</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Financial Secretary to the Treasury <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3183943337"><s>@</s><b>MelJStride</b></span> spoke to AccountingWEB about the decision to delay MTD, his life in business, the VAT threshold and his vision for the future of HMRC. <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://buff.ly/2z6bUBe" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://buff.ly/2z6bUBe"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">buff.ly/2z6bUBe</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span></div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Mel Stride MP Retweeted HM Treasury</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">In the Budget we increased the National Living Wage by 4.4% - thats an increase of 600 a year for a full-time worker on the NLW.<a href="https://t.co/1TiqBnFZld" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/hmtreasury/status/940519589166895109" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/hmtreasury/status/940519589166895109"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/hmtreasury/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/940519589166895109</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Mel Stride MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/hmtreasury/status/940519589166895109" data-conversation-id="940516390288621569" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="940519589166895109" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="hmtreasury" data-user-id="18904582" href="/hmtreasury/status/940519589166895109" data-conversation-id="940516390288621569" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
              <div class="QuoteMedia-videoPreview">

      <div class="AdaptiveMedia-badge">
        <div class="AdaptiveMedia-badgeText">0:26</div>

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">HM Treasury</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>hmtreasury</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">The Autumn Budget is helping families with the cost of living by cutting taxes, freezing fuel duty and increasing the National Living Wage. <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>inflation</b></span> <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/9I8l2Eykpf</span></div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Friday's agreement is good news for people who voted Leave, who were worried we were so bogged down in tortuous negotiations it was never going to happen.

And it is good news for people who voted Remain, who were worried we were going to crash out without a deal.<a href="https://t.co/8RkhD07kmI" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/8RkhD07kmI</a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Mel Stride MP Retweeted HM Treasury</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">The single fiscal event will allow <a href="/hmtreasury" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="18904582"><s>@</s><b>hmtreasury</b></a> more time to consult on tax policy. A key ask from <a href="/CIOTNews" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14267096"><s>@</s><b>CIOTNews</b></a> <a href="/instituteforgov" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="138075752"><s>@</s><b>instituteforgov</b></a> <a href="/TheIFS" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="215679747"><s>@</s><b>TheIFS</b></a><a href="https://t.co/5xdVMjnTuA" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/hmtreasury/status/938390100072943617" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/hmtreasury/status/938390100072943617"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/hmtreasury/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/938390100072943617</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Mel Stride MP added,</p>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards cards-forward&#10;" data-tweet-id="938428534749573121" data-item-id="938428534749573121" data-permalink-path="/hmtreasury/status/938428534749573121" data-conversation-id="938428534749573121" data-tweet-nonce="938428534749573121-fdf6613d-4b6b-45fc-9b11-78300e7d915a" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="938470218711658497" data-retweeter="MelJStride" data-screen-name="hmtreasury" data-name="HM Treasury" data-user-id="18904582" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="PhilipHammondUK OBR_UK" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;18904582&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;hmtreasury&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;HM Treasury&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;HM Treasury&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;HM Treasury&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;3183943337&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;MelJStride&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Mel Stride MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Mel Stride MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Mel Stride MP&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;2653613168&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;PhilipHammondUK&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Philip Hammond&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Philip Hammond&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Philip Hammond&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;398605365&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;OBR_UK&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;OBR&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;OBR&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;OBR&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-card2-type="promo_website" data-has-cards="true">

    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/MelJStride" data-user-id="3183943337">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Philip Hammond Retweeted Bank of England</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Our economy is strong and resilient, supported by independent monetary policy and stable prices from the Bank of England. 1/2<a href="https://t.co/Lzy6cpUklM" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/bankofengland/status/926056332893007872" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/bankofengland/status/926056332893007872"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/bankofengland/</span><span class="invisible">status/926056332893007872</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Philip Hammond added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/bankofengland/status/926056332893007872" data-conversation-id="926056332893007872" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">52</span>
  </span>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Mel Stride MP Retweeted HM Revenue &amp; Customs</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">We're giving mid-sized businesses tailored support so they can get the certainty they need while they grow. <a href="/hashtag/GrowthSupport?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GrowthSupport</b></a> <a href="/HMRCgovuk" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="107540002"><s>@</s><b>HMRCgovuk</b></a><a href="https://t.co/vYLO8atRI1" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/hmrcgovuk/status/910405712924246017" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/hmrcgovuk/status/910405712924246017"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/hmrcgovuk/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/910405712924246017</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Mel Stride MP added,</p>

</div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Figures out today show Corporation Tax (CT) receipts reached their highest ever level in 16/17 at over 49billion.</p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Mel Stride MP Retweeted HM Treasury</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Today, <a href="/hmtreasury" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="18904582"><s>@</s><b>hmtreasury</b></a> launched a consultation on financing growth in innovative firms including role of tax incentives.<a href="https://t.co/Uhe4pwKMBH" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/hmtreasury/status/892306311169310720" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/hmtreasury/status/892306311169310720"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/hmtreasury/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/892306311169310720</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

          <span class="UIWalkthrough-stepProgress"></span>
          <button class="UIWalkthrough-skip js-close">
            Skip all
          </button>
        </div>
        



<div class="UIWalkthrough-step UIWalkthrough-step--welcome">
  <h3 class="UIWalkthrough-title">
    <span class="Icon Icon--home UIWalkthrough-icon"></span>
    Welcome home!
  </h3>
  <p class="UIWalkthrough-message">This timeline is where youll spend most of your time, getting instant updates about what matters to you.</p>
</div>



<div class="UIWalkthrough-step UIWalkthrough-step--unfollow">
  <h3 class="UIWalkthrough-title">
    <span class="Icon Icon--smileRating1Fill UIWalkthrough-icon"></span>
    Tweets not doing it for you?
  </h3>
  <p class="UIWalkthrough-message">
    Hover over the profile pic and click the Following button to unfollow any account you're not interested in anymore.
  </p>
</div>

<div class="UIWalkthrough-step UIWalkthrough-step--like">

  <h3 class="UIWalkthrough-title">
    <span class="Icon Icon--heart UIWalkthrough-icon"></span>
    Say a lot with a little
  </h3>
  <p class="UIWalkthrough-message">
    When you see a Tweet you love, tap the heart  it lets  the person who wrote it know that you appreciate them.
  </p>
</div>

<div class="UIWalkthrough-step UIWalkthrough-step--retweet">
  <h3 class="UIWalkthrough-title">
    <span class="Icon Icon--retweet UIWalkthrough-icon"></span>
    Spread the word
  </h3>
  <p class="UIWalkthrough-message">
    The fastest way to share someone elses Tweet with your followers is with a Retweet. Tap the icon to send it instantly.
  </p>
</div>

  <h3 class="UIWalkthrough-title">
    <span class="Icon Icon--reply UIWalkthrough-icon"></span>
    Join the conversation
  </h3>
  <p class="UIWalkthrough-message">
    Add your thoughts about any Tweet with a Reply. Find a topic youre passionate about and jump right in.
  </p>
</div>
